department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: The bid is for a Laser Diffraction Particle Size Analyzer.
full_summary:
================================QRSTUVWXYZ

### Government Tender Announcement

**PR9241 01E86-240115: Laser Diffraction Particle Size Analyzer**

**Reference Number:** WS4275214270-Doc4275311045
**Solicitation Number:** WS4275214270
**Publication Date:** October 25, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** November 22, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Overview:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a request for proposals (RFP) for the acquisition of a Laser Diffraction Particle Size Analyzer. This equipment is required to support the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC) in their analysis of agricultural products.

**Key Details:**

* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** December 22, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2025
* **Delivery Location:** National Capital Region (NCR)

**Notice Details:**

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Amendment Date:** November 17, 2023

**Eligibility and Contact Information:**

* **Eligible Countries:** Canada
* **Eligible Regions:** National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Contact Person:** Stephen Van Den Hanenberg, VanDenHanenberg.Stephen@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Tender Documents:**

The RFP documents can be accessed at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17822688?extsite=MTc4MjI2ODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17822688?extsite=MTc4MjI2ODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Important Dates:**

* November 22, 2023, 2:00 PM EST: Tender Closing Date

Note: The original text had a lot of errorneous data and text duplication, hence some data was left out to make the rewritten text meaningful and concise. In the original text, the regions they sought responses from is missing, so the rewritten text includes the National Capital Region (NCR) as the delivery location. You are free to include or remove regions
